When I got a Slayer task, Example;

18 Black demons, I go hunt them down, I kill a Black demon. And I check the ammount of Black demons left, It stucks at 18. It doesnâ€™t count down.

And the Barrows killcount doesnt count up, Which i cant open the chest.
